title: Where can I download Pygame? - Quora

response.answer_text: first of all the pygame from many sites did not work for me. After hours of surfing i got one website which helped me out .http://python-gaming.com/pygame/downloads.html download the version suitable for your python. then go onto command prompt. write the address where your file is downloaded.then write pip install pygame-1.9.2-cp36-cp36m-win32.whl this was the name of my pygame. write the name of your pygame. it should work now. hopefully i helped you.
